proyectos.description: Do you have to find a census book of the city of Barcelona after 1930? This app can help you, just go in and filter by street, dsitricte or year!
Just like the hanged game but guessing movies! Designed for seniors to exercise their memory by recalling their favorite movies.
Do you need help organizing your trips? Freeway is the solution. An easy App to save and manage all your travel informations

Management of the purchase and sale of cinema tickets. Data management is done through a global status using Vuex.
